pr_title: Add support for field and header prefix

timeline.bodyText: Seems like you applied some auto-organization of imports? Can you please revert this, to keep the diff focused on the actual changes? You can run mvn process-sources to ensure the formatting is right before committing. Thx!
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

replies.bodyText: yes.. My intellij reformat is doing that.. Fixed it now. Thanks
replies.author: rgannu

replies.bodyText: No worries; looking much better now, thx!
replies.author: gunnarmorling

timeline.message:
DBZ-2504: Add support for field and header prefix

Added support for field and header prefix.
Updated the documentation to include the options
 'add.fields.prefix' and 'add.headers.prefix'.

DBZ-2504: Add support for field and header prefix

Added support for field and header prefix.
Updated the documentation to include the options
 'add.fields.prefix' and 'add.headers.prefix'.
